about_the_game:
Dark Desire Mute 3


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life's of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

"Jeff was ushered to the side as the girls began a whirlwind of activity on me. My makeup was changed. My hair was styled in such a way to allow a few strands to drift down towards my jawline, but the rest was kept securely out of the way." - Cindy, extract from episode 02

“Oh, I’m sure we can work something out,” Stephanie pats his arm. “I’m all about making customers happy, no matter their taste.” - Stephanie in episode 01

Episode 01 - Stephanie’s Proposition
--- includes separate paths and second outfits
Episode 02 - Perfect Lips
--- includes separate paths
Episode 03 - The Mysterious Text
--- includes separate paths
--- includes side stories (NEW!!! 3 side stories related to Michelle's life - something new and original)
Episode 04 - A Proper Date

The game is complete.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.

Dark Desire Mute 3


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life's of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

"Jeff was ushered to the side as the girls began a whirlwind of activity on me. My makeup was changed. My hair was styled in such a way to allow a few strands to drift down towards my jawline, but the rest was kept securely out of the way." - Cindy, extract from episode 02

“Oh, I’m sure we can work something out,” Stephanie pats his arm. “I’m all about making customers happy, no matter their taste.” - Stephanie in episode 01

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
